attributes.action: Lower the income fresh hold for those wanting to sponsor a foreign spouse.
attributes.additional_details: Dear all, I am writing this petition in a bide to stop this unjust cruelty yes I am using that world cruelty here. That is set by the UK government, on those of lower income's to be with their foreign spouse. How on earth can a country that boasts human rights.Tear apart spouses based on their income? Why should those on a certain status be granted happiness in Marriage? So I ask the UK government to scrape the £18'600 rule and lower it  and allow those on other benefits not just DLA to apply.
attributes.background: Dear all, I am writing this petition in a bide to stop this unjust cruelty imposed by the UK government on those of a lower income to be with their spouses.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577594
